name: School Stroll
description:
This game was developed for a University project, specifically for our Game Prototyping subject. It's our first-ever game in Unity, every asset was downloaded either from the Unity Asset Store or from Itch.io, all the credit goes to the respective artists of the sprites and tilemaps. The cliche behind this game was "the stories our parents told us about their everyday journey to school" which are usually exaggerated to a comical amount. The control scheme for the game is the classic

[A] - left
[D] - right
[Spacebar] - jump

This is everything you need to start playing. Some obstacles that you will encounter throughout the levels may seem difficult and this is by design (but trust us, all of them are doable, you just need to find the right approach).

We are awaiting any feedback, positive or negative, since this is the first project we will be more than happy to hear you out so that we can improve upon future projects!
